<< Please continue, don't sit yourself out on this. I, for one, really enjoy
and appreciate your "in your face", "tell it like it is" way of communication.
>>

I second that motion. I for one have much to learn. Kimme

messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 72
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sandra, Please continue, don t sit yourself out on this.  I, for one, really enjoy and appreciate your in your face , tell it like it is way of
messages.messageBody:
>>Okay, I'm skating near the thin ice of blasphemy, so I'll go sit on the bench a while.<<

Sandra,

Please continue, don't sit yourself out on this. I, for one, really enjoy and appreciate your "in your face", "tell it like it is" way of communication.

Let it roll,

Karen Mowery
---------------
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined. - Henry David Thoreau
